definition: lit. the sky is high and the emperor is far away (idiom)/fig. remote places are beyond the reach of the central government
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
lit. strong dragon cannot repress a snake (idiom); fig. a local gangster who is above the law
pinyin: qiang2 long2 bu4 ya1 di4 tou2 she2

definition: tyrannical abuse (idiom); riding roughshod over people
lit. barren hills and wild rivers (idiom)/fig. inhospitable natural environment
lit. to hide the sky with one hand/to hide the truth from the masses
(of a warlord etc) to assemble one's personal army, thereby presenting a challenge to the central government
officials shield one another (idiom); a cover-up

pinyin: zheng1 yi1 yan3 bi4 yi1 yan3
zheng1 zhi1 yan3 bi4 zhi1 yan3

definition: to run amok (idiom); to commit outrages
lit. the whip cannot reach (idiom); beyond one's influence/too far to be able to help
outward devotion but inner opposition (idiom); to pay lip service/to agree overtly, but oppose in secret
to break the law and commit crimes (idiom); malefactor/evildoer/to perpetrate outrages
